sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update table="sysauto_script">
    <sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <condition/>
        <conditional>false</conditional>
        <name>AMS_GetVpcs</name>
        <run_as display_value="Madhava Kumar">6f05a9620fabf2401199a109b1050ed3</run_as>
        <run_as_tz/>
        <run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth>
        <run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek>
        <run_period/>
        <run_start>2017-06-27 12:35:52</run_start>
        <run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time>
        <run_type>on_demand</run_type>
        <script><![CDATA[// Call AMSResourceFetch script
var amsGetVpcApi = new AMS_ResourceFetch();

//Fetch VpcId from VPC table
var vpcGR = new GlideRecord('x_138064_ams_vpcs');
vpcGR.query();
var start=new GlideDateTime();
while(vpcGR.next())
{
	//Call getVpc API
	var getVpcInsert = amsGetVpcApi.getVPCAndInsert(vpcGR.u_vpc_id.toString());
	if(!getVpcInsert)
	{
		//If NO VPCs Found
		if ('true' == gs.getProperty('debug.AMSRestCalls'))
			gs.info("Debug >>>AMS GetVPC :"+vpcGR.u_vpc_id+" is not inserted");	
	}
}
gs.eventQueue("x_138064_ams.scheduledJobEventTime",vpcGR,"Scheduled Job Name = AMS_GetVpcs","START Time = "+start+" and END Time = "+new GlideDateTime());]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>madhav</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-06-27 12:37:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update>
        <sys_id>4e5bae2e0f2ff2401199a109b1050ee9</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AMS_GetVpcs</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="AMS" source="x_138064_ams">c370f2450f633200e1c38fbce1050e70</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade>
        <sys_scope display_value="AMS">c370f2450f633200e1c38fbce1050e70</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sysauto_script_4e5bae2e0f2ff2401199a109b1050ee9</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>madhav</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-06-27 12:37:07</sys_updated_on>
        <upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe>
    </sysauto_script>
</record_update>
